home.titleExperience: ## üöÄ What I Learned Building My Portfolio with React
home.subtitle: This project has been a great challenge and an incredible learning experience. Basically, I started from scratch with **React**, and although at first glance it might seem like "just HTML with Tailwind," the truth is that there's much more behind it.
learningList: ‚úÖ **Firestore integration** for storing and retrieving data.
‚úÖ **Route protection** to restrict access to certain sections.
home.dashboardTitle: ### üéØ An Administrative Dashboard Just for Me
home.dashboardDescription: One of the most important features of this portfolio is the **admin dashboard**, accessible only to me. From there, I can:
dashboardList: üîπ Manage a **full CRUD** for blog posts.
üîπ Review messages sent from the **"Contact Me"** form.
home.challengeTitle: ### üîí The Biggest Challenge: Protecting Admin Routes
home.challengeDescription: What challenged me the most was implementing **route protection**, ensuring that only a user with a **specific UID** (mine üòé) could access the dashboard. After several attempts, I managed to make it work correctly.
home.githubText: If you're interested in checking out the source code for this project, you can find it on **GitHub**:

skills.gameDevelopment: üéÆ Game Development with Godot Engine, Unity, and Unreal Engine

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: I built this portfolio from scratch using React and Vite, learning about routing with React Router, state management with useState and useEffect, authentication with Google Authentication, and data storage with Firestore. I implemented a blog with Markdown support and a private admin dashboard where I manage posts and contact messages. The biggest challenge was securing the admin routes, ensuring that only I have access.

helldivers.title: Helldivers Stratagem Simulator
helldivers.description: Simulator designed to improve your speed and accuracy when entering key combinations to deploy stratagems in Helldivers. Test your reflexes and master every strategy.

gitGudAiming.title: Git Gud Aiming
gitGudAiming.description: Game designed to improve aiming accuracy and speed in FPS, with interactive levels and high-quality graphics, developed in Unreal Engine 4.

chileMiniapps.title: Chile Miniapps
chileMiniapps.description: App that provides useful and updated information for Chileans, including on-duty pharmacies, exchange rates, public services and emergency schedules, weather forecasts, and other relevant data.

flaiteGPT.title: FlaiteGPT
flaiteGPT.description: Application created to learn React, simulating a chatbot similar to ChatGPT, using the OpenAI API (APIKEY currently down).

pomodoroApp.title: Pomodoro App
pomodoroApp.description: Simple Pomodoro timer created to practice state management in React. It works with 25-minute work cycles followed by 5-minute breaks and plays a 'ding' sound at each transition.

tokTik.title: TokTik
tokTik.description: TikTok interface clone developed in Flutter, featuring smooth video playback with lazy loading optimization before being viewed. Created as a learning project to enhance Flutter skills.

yesNoMaybeApp.title: Yes No Maybe App
yesNoMaybeApp.description: A chat-style app created to practice Flutter, where sending a message ending in '?' triggers a simulated response accompanied by a GIF corresponding to 'Yes,' 'No,' or 'Maybe.'

personalSkills.title: Personal Skills
personalSkills.description: Additional skills that enrich and complement my technical profile, allowing me to tackle projects comprehensively, adapt to different challenges, and provide more complete and efficient solutions.
